trans-unit.source: JournalEntryUnifiedViewConverter merges navigation back history and navigation forward history (as exposed by <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Frame"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow"></xref>) into a single, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie7](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ie7-md.md)]-style navigation menu.

Both <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> and <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> display navigation chrome that supports history navigation using the following mechanisms: - A button for navigating back one piece of content at a time.
- A button for navigating forward one piece of content at a time.

- An [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie7](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ie7-md.md)]-style drop-down list that shows: - A combined list of up to nine items in back navigation history and up to nine items in forward navigation history.
- The position of the current piece of content with respect to both back and forward navigation history.

The navigation history is stored by both <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> in the following properties: **Back Navigation History**: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.BackStack%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.BackStack%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

**Forward Navigation History**: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.ForwardStack%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.ForwardStack%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

To create the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie7](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ie7-md.md)]-style drop-down list, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> use JournalEntryUnifiedViewConverter to merge their individual back navigation history and forward navigation history into a single list of navigation history entries.
The resulting list contains up to nine entries from back navigation history and up to nine entries from forward navigation history, plus an entry for the current content.

If you create custom navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], and need to provide an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie7](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ie7-md.md)]-style drop-down list, you can use JournalEntryUnifiedViewConverter to similar effect.
XAML Attribute Usage This class is not typically used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.JournalEntryUnifiedViewConverter"></xref> class.
Merges two navigation history stacks.

For <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>, the navigation stacks are available from the following properties: - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.BackStack%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.ForwardStack%2A> For <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, the navigation stacks are available from the following properties: - <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.BackStack%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.ForwardStack%2A> The two passed navigation stacks are combined into a single navigation stack that contains up to nine items from each navigation stack plus the current item.

XAML Attribute Usage Members of this class are either not typically used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], or cannot be used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
An array of two navigation stacks.
This parameter is not used.
This parameter is not used.
This parameter is not used.

An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> that can be used to enumerate the merged list of navigation history stacks if neither passed navigation stack is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, otherwise.
Not implemented.

This parameter is not used.
This parameter is not used.

This parameter is not used.
Always returns <xref href="System.Windows.Data.Binding.DoNothing"></xref>.
Gets the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalEntryUnifiedViewConverter.JournalEntryPosition*> attached property for the specified element.
The element from which to get the attached property value.
The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalEntryUnifiedViewConverter.JournalEntryPosition*> attached property of the journal entry for the specified element.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalEntryUnifiedViewConverter.JournalEntryPosition*> attached property.
To be added.
Sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.JournalEntryUnifiedViewConverter.JournalEntryPositionProperty"></xref> attached property of the specified element.

## XAML Attribute Usage Members of this class are either not typically used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], or cannot be used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
